## Northen countries

North european countries are considered as leaders in climate policy

- Early adopters of carbon tax in the 1990's
- Renewable Energy in Sweden or Denmark

## The interesting case of Austria

However, compared to the other countries, Austria is both considered as a laggard in climate policy and do not have a strong polarisation of its attitudes towards climate change. Consequently, we should definitely included it.
